sentences.sContent: Our table tennis team captured three gold medals at the games.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our table tennis team captured three gold medals at the games.
sentences.sCn: 我们的乒乓球队在比赛中赢得了三块金牌。

sentences.sContent: In table tennis, the eyes see the ball coming, judge its speed and direction, and pass this information on to the brain.
sentences.sContent_eng: In table tennis, the eyes see the ball coming, judge its speed and direction, and pass this information on to the brain.
sentences.sCn: 比如说，打乒乓球的时候，眼睛看到球打过来，判断其速度和方向，马上将这个信息传给大脑。

trans.tranOther: an indoor game played on a table by two or four players who hit a small plastic ball to each other across a net
